si.title: 45-year-old murdered by son-in-law with garden hoe
body_lines: A 45-year-old resident of Sithamparapuram in Vavuniya, has been attacked to death with a garden hoe allegedly by his son-in-law after a dispute between then had escalated last evening (06), according to the police.
තම බිරිඳගෙන් වෙන්වීමෙන් පසු තනිවම ජීවත් වූ මියගොස් ඇත්තේ උයනේදී උදාවේ උදැල්ලකින් පහර දීමෙන් පසුව ඔහුගේ මිතුරා වූ ඔහුගේ මිතුරා හෙල්මට වින්දිතයාට පහර දී තිබේ.
The victim’s body has been placed at the Vavuniya Hospital’s Mortuary, while the two suspects, aged 22 and 24, have been apprehended in connection with the incident, police said.

ta.title: கார்டன் ஹோவுடன் மருமகனால் கொலை செய்யப்பட்ட 45 வயது
body_lines: வாவ்னியாவில் சித்தம்பரபுரத்தில் வசிக்கும் 45 வயதான ஒருவர், நேற்று மாலை (06) அதிகரித்த ஒரு தகராறு பின்னர் தனது மருமகனால் கூறப்படும் தோட்டப் பயணத்துடன் மரண தண்டனை விதிக்கப்பட்டுள்ளதாக போலீசார் தெரிவித்தனர்.

The deceased, who had been living by himself after separating from his wife, had succumbed to his critical injuries after being attacked with a garden hoe by his son-in-law while the latter’s friend had also attacked the victim with a helmet.
The victim’s body has been placed at the Vavuniya Hospital’s Mortuary, while the two suspects, aged 22 and 24, have been apprehended in connection with the incident, police said.
